BACKGROUNDS.name: Urchin
BACKGROUNDS.description: You gew up in the merciless treets of a large city.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Wanted
BACKGROUNDS.description: There's a price on your head, but you have allies.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Cult Initiate
BACKGROUNDS.description: You know blasphemous secrets and rituals.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Thieves' Guild
BACKGROUNDS.description: You have connections, contacts, and debts.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Banished
BACKGROUNDS.description: Your people cast you out for supposed crimes.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Orphaned
BACKGROUNDS.description: An unusual guardian rescued and raised you.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Wizard's Apprentice
BACKGROUNDS.description: You have a knack and eye for magic.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Jeweler
BACKGROUNDS.description: You can easily appraise value and authenticity.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Herbalist
BACKGROUNDS.description: You know plants, medicines, and poisons.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Barbarian
BACKGROUNDS.description: You left the horde, but it never quite left you.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Mercenary
BACKGROUNDS.description: You fought friend and foe alike for your coin.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Sailor
BACKGROUNDS.description: Pirate, privateer, or merchant - the seas are yours.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Acolyte
BACKGROUNDS.description: You're well trained in religious rites and doctrines.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Soldier
BACKGROUNDS.description: You served as a fighter in an organized army.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Ranger
BACKGROUNDS.description: The woods and wilds are your true home.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Scout
BACKGROUNDS.description: You survived on stealth, observation, and speed.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Minstrel
BACKGROUNDS.description: You've traveled far with your charm and talent.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Scholar
BACKGROUNDS.description: You know much about ancient history and lore.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Noble
BACKGROUNDS.description: A famous name has opened many doors for you.

BACKGROUNDS.name: Chirurgeon
BACKGROUNDS.description: You know anatomy, surgery, and first aid.
